title: The Trouble on the Hill
description: In this Dateline classic, a feud between neighbors turns a quiet canyon road into a deadly battleground. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 8, 2009.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
